events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago and my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated in days.
Classifying the reported issue as a delivery delay based on the customer's description of late shipment and tracking problems.
Assigning the case to the delivery support team to investigate the late shipment and tracking status for the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your package hasn't arrived yet. I’m here to help find out what’s causing the delay.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can check the shipment status?
Sure, my order number is 9485723 and the tracking shows 'In transit' but has not changed for five days.
Thank you for the info. I’ve contacted the carrier and requested an expedited update. You should receive a new tracking update shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate you checking with the carrier and hope the package arrives soon.
The carrier has confirmed the shipment is now out for delivery. Your package should arrive by the end of the day.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your package and that the delivery delay has been resolved satisfactorily.
The case is now closed as your package was delivered and no further issues were reported. Thank you for your patience.
